sentences.en: A huge backlog of work had built up.
sentences.cn: 一大堆工作积压了起来.

sentences.en: After her summer vacation, she has got a huge backlog of work to do.
sentences.cn: 暑假休假以后, 她手头有许多积压的工作要做.

sentences.en: Backlog — A reserve supply or an accumulation of unfilled orders.
sentences.cn: 积压未交订货,已经下了定单但未交付的订货.

sentences.en: I was almost buried by a backlog of work after the holidays.
sentences.cn: 假期结束后我一头扎在积压的一大堆工作中.

sentences.en: I worry that Kanban systems, with their limited backlog , will exacerbate this problem.
sentences.cn: 我很担心看板系统中限制了的backlog, 很可能火上浇油.

sentences.en: Investment is needed to reduce the backlog of repairs.
sentences.cn: 需要投资来減轻积压的维修工作.

sentences.en: It’s going to take us months to clear the backlog .
sentences.cn: 我们得花好几个月才能处理完积压未办的事情。

sentences.en: Mapping of product packets ( objects ) for backlog items in the selected release.
sentences.cn: 在选定的版本中,为待定项和产品包 ( 对象 ) 间建立对应关系.

sentences.en: On March 31,2010 and its firm order backlog totaled US $ 16 billion.
sentences.cn: 截止到2010年3月31日,全公司共有员工16,792人,公司的累积确认储备订单总价值为160亿美元.

sentences.en: Review and prepare NE orders units, price, mixture , margin, and backlog analysis.
sentences.cn: 准备并审核新梯订单台量 、 价格 、 产品组合及库存订单分析.

sentences.en: The C - 130 J crews cleared that backlog in four days.
sentences.cn: C-130J机组在四天内将这批订货运送完毕.

sentences.en: The genius lie in a backlog, the cleverness lies in diligence.
sentences.cn: 天才在于积累, 聪明在于勤奋.

sentences.en: The strong results in 2008 due to an accumulated backlog of orders.
sentences.cn: 2008年的强劲业绩是因为前期积压的订单.

sentences.en: There is a backlog of repairs and maintenance in schools.
sentences.cn: 对各学校的修缮和维护工作积压了一堆。

sentences.en: There is a large backlog of cases to hear.
We have a backlog of reservations from last night.
sentences.cn: 我们从昨晚起就积压了一大堆预约.

words.tran_cn: [管理]积压的工作；积压待办的事务；大木材

trans.tran_cn: 积压未办之事，没交付的订货，存货，储备
trans.tran_en: a large amount of work that you need to complete, especially work that should already have been completed
